subject: Ski Jumping
lead_paragraph: Severin Freund leapt to a victory in Kuopio, Finland. The World Cup leader, Petr Prevc of Slovenia, managed only a 17th-place finish and dropped to third in the standings.
snippet: Severin Freund leapt to a victory in Kuopio, Finland. The World Cup leader, Petr Prevc of Slovenia, managed only a 17th-place finish and dropped to third in the standings.
